Title: A Left-behind Note
Text:
Henry and I found a Supply Chest behind two pipes. Henry thinks it's loot the Black Alley stashed here ten years ago.
Well, I think he's full of it. Those gangsters aren't idiots. Why would they hide their loot in such an obvious place? It's gotta be a Chest Mimic that somehow found its way here from the sewers. If anyone finds this note, DO NOT TOUCH THIS SUPPLY CHEST.
I'll ask Talos to come check it out when she has time.
